sqlMap.update:
update H_SGSN
REGION = #region:VARCHAR#
SGSN_NAME = #sgsnName:VARCHAR#
UI_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #uiAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#
GB_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #gbAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#
TOTAL_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #totalAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#
THOUGHPUT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #thoughputCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#
PDP_CONTEXT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #pdpContextCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#
SGSN_ATTACT_SUCCR = #sgsnAttactSuccr:DECIMAL#
SGSN_PSSR = #sgsnPssr:DECIMAL#
SGSN_PAGE_SUCCR = #sgsnPageSuccr:DECIMAL#
SGSN_AUTH_SUCCR = #sgsnAuthSuccr:DECIMAL#
SGSN_INTRA_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnIntraRauSucr:DECIMAL#
SGSN_INTER_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnInterRauSucr:DECIMAL#
LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#
DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#
TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#
SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#
NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR#
where SGSNID = #sgsnid:VARCHAR#

update H_SGSN set REGION = #region:VARCHAR#, SGSN_NAME = #sgsnName:VARCHAR#, UI_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #uiAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, GB_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #gbAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, TOTAL_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #totalAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, THOUGHPUT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #thoughputCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, PDP_CONTEXT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #pdpContextCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, SGSN_ATTACT_SUCCR = #sgsnAttactSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_PSSR = #sgsnPssr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_PAGE_SUCCR = #sgsnPageSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_AUTH_SUCCR = #sgsnAuthSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_INTRA_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnIntraRauSucr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_INTER_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnInterRauSucr:DECIMAL#, LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#, DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#, TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#, SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#, NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR# where SGSNID = #sgsnid:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select * from H_SGSN order by SGSN_NAME
SELECT SGSN_NAME FROM H_SGSN WHERE SGSN_NAME like '%' || #value# || '%' ORDER BY H_SGSN

SELECT * FROM H_SGSN
REGION = #region:VARCHAR#
UPPER(SGSNID) like '%' || UPPER(#sgsnid:VARCHAR#) || '%'
UPPER(SGSN_NAME) like '%' || UPPER(#sgsnName:VARCHAR#) || '%'
order by REGION, SGSN_NAME

select SGSNID, REGION, SGSN_NAME, UI_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE, GB_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE, TOTAL_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE, THOUGHPUT_CAPACITY_LICENSE, PDP_CONTEXT_CAPACITY_LICENSE, SGSN_ATTACT_SUCCR, SGSN_PSSR, SGSN_PAGE_SUCCR, SGSN_AUTH_SUCCR, SGSN_INTRA_RAU_SUCR, SGSN_INTER_RAU_SUCR, LOCATION_NAME, DEPT, TEAM, SUB_TEAM, NE_GROUP, ID from H_SGSN where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update: update H_SGSN set REGION = #region:VARCHAR#, SGSN_NAME = #sgsnName:VARCHAR#, UI_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #uiAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, GB_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #gbAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, TOTAL_ATTACH_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #totalAttachCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, THOUGHPUT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #thoughputCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, PDP_CONTEXT_CAPACITY_LICENSE = #pdpContextCapacityLicense:DECIMAL#, SGSN_ATTACT_SUCCR = #sgsnAttactSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_PSSR = #sgsnPssr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_PAGE_SUCCR = #sgsnPageSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_AUTH_SUCCR = #sgsnAuthSuccr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_INTRA_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnIntraRauSucr:DECIMAL#, SGSN_INTER_RAU_SUCR = #sgsnInterRauSucr:DECIMAL#, LOCATION_NAME = #locationName:VARCHAR#, DEPT = #dept:VARCHAR#, TEAM = #team:VARCHAR#, SUB_TEAM = #subTeam:VARCHAR#, NE_GROUP = #neGroup:VARCHAR#, SGSNID = #sgsnid:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
